column4: anyone know why after installing 11.04 from USB without downloading packages or 3rd party tools I can't get the GUI to boot?
what video chip do you use?
i can get to terminal fine if i alt-ctrl-f1 but if i just let it boot my monitor gets no signal. this is on an ati radeon 5xxx
like i see it begin to go through its little dot splash screen
then the monitor just loses...and yes dvi
like i said, i can see terminal on same output just fine
is it because 11.04 is "beta" or is that just a fluke?
11.04 isn't beta, its released and stable
it will give you a deskto, you  can then install updates and/or the ati proprietary driver if you wish which should then fix things
